title: Gnar recall missing sounds
body:
When Gnar {{champion:150}} recalls as minignar, He would make his usual noises and giggle as he plays with his boomerang.

He isn't doing any sounds anymore. I was wondering what is up with that.

replies.body:
Hey The Blackfist,

This is definitely a bug, and not the intended behavior of the recall. Thanks for the report!
